title: Minecraft裝了AnimatedPlayer後崩溃了,求解
author: Silenced
txt_content:
如題......---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Uh... Did I do that?Time: 2013/6/17 下午 6:39
Description: Failed to start gamecpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: mods.AnimatedPlayer.AnimatedPlayer

replies.author: 我的世界忠实者
replies.txt_content: 你装了TMI、手电筒和这个模组，对吧。可我也同时装过这些模组却没崩溃，你还装了些什么？
